hasMessage.hasTextContent: Darunavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   venlafaxine .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Darunavir is predicted to increase the exposure to verapamil. Manufacturer advises monitor.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Darunavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   verapamil .  Manufacturer advises monitor .

hasDitaContent.@value: Darunavir is predicted to increase the exposure to vinblastine. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Darunavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   vinblastine .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Darunavir is predicted to increase the exposure to vincristine. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasDitaContent.@value: Darunavir is predicted to increase the exposure to vindesine. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Darunavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   vindesine .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Darunavir is predicted to increase the exposure to vinflunine. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasDitaContent.@value: Darunavir is predicted to affect the exposure to voriconazole and voriconazole potentially affects the exposure to darunavir. Manufacturer advises monitor efficacy and toxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Darunavir   is predicted to   affect   the exposure to   voriconazole  and  voriconazole   potentially   affects   the exposure to   darunavir .  Manufacturer advises monitor efficacy and toxicity .

hasDitaContent.@value: Darunavir is predicted to affect the anticoagulant effect of warfarin. Manufacturer advises monitor INR.
